workflow.name: Automated WhatsApp upsell messages for Shopify cancellations with Rapiwa & Sheet
workflow.description:
## Who is this for?
This workflow is for Shopify store owners, customer success, and marketing teams who want to automatically check customers‚Äô WhatsApp numbers and send personalized messages with discount codes for canceled orders. It helps recover lost sales by reaching out with special offers.

## What This Workflow Does
* Automatically checks for canceled orders on a schedule
* Fetches canceled orders from Shopify
* Creates personalized recovery messages based on customer data
* Verifies customers‚Äô WhatsApp numbers via Rapiwa
* Logs results in Google Sheets: *‚ÄúVerified & Sent‚Äù* for successful messages, *‚ÄúUnverified & Not Sent‚Äù* for unverified numbers


## Requirements
- Shopify store with API access enabled
- Shopify API credentials with access to orders and customer data
- Rapiwa account and a valid Bearer token
- Google account with Sheets access and OAuth2 credentials

## Setup plan
1. **Add your credentials**
   * **Rapiwa:** Create an HTTP Bearer credential in n8n and paste your token (example name: *Rapiwa Bearer Auth*).
   * **Google Sheets:** Add an OAuth2 credential (example name: *Google Sheets*).

2. **Set up Shopify**
   * Replace **your_shopify_domain** with your real Shopify domain.
   * Replace **your_shop_access-token** with your actual Shopify API token.

3. **Set up Google Sheets**
   * Update the example spreadsheet ID and sheet gid with your own.
   * Make sure your sheet‚Äôs column headers match the mapping keys exactly‚Äîsame spelling, case, and no extra spaces.

4. **Configure the Schedule Trigger**
   * Choose how often you want the workflow to check for canceled orders (daily, weekly, etc.).

5. **Check the HTTP Request nodes**
   * **Verify endpoint:** Should call Rapiwa‚Äôs *verifyWhatsAppNumber*.
   * **Send endpoint:** Should use Rapiwa‚Äôs send-message API with your template (includes customer name, reorder link, discount code).

## Google Sheet Column Structure
The Google Sheets nodes in the flow append rows with these column. Make sure the sheet headers match exactly.

**A Google Sheet formatted like this** ‚û§ [sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nvrxINR5Cch5SChGydf62W6PcDdTmdDnlqBif6iTgLU/edit?usp=sharing)


| Name         | Number        | Item Name   | Coupon   | Item Link   |  Validity   | Status |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------------- | -------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- | ---------- | ------ |
| Abdul Mannan | 8801322827799 | Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra 5G 256GB-512GB-1TB | REORDER5 | [Re-order Link](https://your_shopify_domain/94618124606xxxxxthenticatexx/250c6a7d50018140b2ac21741233) |  verified   | sent   |
| Abdul Mannan | 8801322827790 | Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra 5G 256GB-512GB-1TB | REORDER5 | [Re-order Link](https://your_shopify_domain/94618124606xxxxxthenticatexx/250c6a7d50018140b2ac21741233) | unverified | not sent   |



## Important Notes
- Do not hard-code API keys or tokens; always use n8n credentials.
- Google Sheets column header names must match the mapping keys used in the nodes. Trailing spaces are common accidental problems ‚Äî trim them in the spreadsheet or adjust the mapping.
- Message templates reference - update templates if you need to reference different data.
- The workflow processes cancelled orders in batches to avoid rate limits. Adjust the batch size if needed.

## Useful Links
- **Install Rapiwa**: [How to install Rapiwa](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-rapiwa)
- **Dashboard:** [https://app.rapiwa.com](https://app.rapiwa.com/login)
- **Official Website:** [https://rapiwa.com](https://rapiwa.com/)
- **Documentation:** [https://docs.rapiwa.com](https://docs.rapiwa.com/)
- **Shopify API Documentation:** [https://shopify.dev/docs/admin-api](https://shopify.dev/docs/admin-api)

## Support & Help
- **WhatsApp**: [Chat on WhatsApp](https://wa.me/8801322827799)
- **Discord**: [SpaGreen Community](https://discord.gg/SsCChWEP)
- **Facebook Group**: [SpaGreen Support](https://www.facebook.com/groups/spagreenbd)
- **Website**: [https://spagreen.net](https://spagreen.net)
- **Developer Portfolio**: [Codecanyon SpaGreen](https://codecanyon.net/user/spagreen/portfolio)

nodes.name: Get Product name with re-order llink

parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $('Get Product name with re-order llink').item.json.name }}

We noticed you cancelled your recent order!
If you‚Äôd like to try again, you can reorder the same product using the link below:

üëâ {{ $('Get Product name with re-order llink').item.json.re_order_link }}

Use code *REORDER5* to get *5%* off your next purchase üéÅ

Thank you for shopping with us!
‚ÄîSpaGreen Creative Team

parameters.content:
### 1. Check valid whatsapp number Using Rapiwa
- Purpose: Verify WhatsApp registration via Rapiwa API.
### 3. Rapiwa Sender
- Purpose: Send personalized WhatsApp messages for verified numbers.
### 4. Store State of Rows in Verified & Sent
- Document: references a Google spreadsheet ID (example ID in the node configuration).
### 5. Store State of Rows in Unverified & Not Sent
- Purpose: Write a row for numbers that are not registered on WhatsApp.

nodes.name: Store State of Rows in Verified & Sent
Store State of Rows in Unverified & Not Sent

parameters.content:
# Send WhatsApp Upsell Recommendation Message for Shopify
## Overview
- **Fetch cancelled orders** on a schedule
- **Collect customer and product details**
- **Verify the customer‚Äôs WhatsApp number** using Rapiwa
- **Send a personalized recovery message** with a discount code
- **Save on Google sheet** (sent, delivered, not sent, not verified)


## Workflow Steps
### 2. Get All Cancelled Order
- **Purpose**: Retrieves all cancelled orders from Shopify
- **API Endpoint**: `https://your_shopify_domain/admin/api/2025-07/orders.json?customer_id=&status=cancelled`
### 5. Get Specific Customer Data
- **Purpose**: Retrieves all orders for each customer
- **API Endpoint**: `https://your_shopify_domain/admin/api/2025-07/orders.json?customer_id={{ $json.customer.id }}&status=any`
### 6. Get Customer Info
- **Purpose**: Fetches detailed customer profile information
- **API Endpoint**: `https://your_shopify_domain/admin/api/2025-07/customers/{{ $json.customerId }}.json`

## Google Sheet Required Columns
**A Google Sheet formatted like this** ‚û§ [sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nvrxINR5Cch5SChGydf62W6PcDdTmdDnlqBif6iTgLU/edit?usp=sharing)

## Useful Links
- **Install Rapiwa**: [How to install Rapiwa](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-rapiwa)
- **Shopify API Documentation**: [https://shopify.dev/docs/admin-api](https://shopify.dev/docs/admin-api)
- **Rapiwa Dashboard**: [https://app.rapiwa.com](https://app.rapiwa.com/login)
- **Rapiwa Documentation**: [https://docs.rapiwa.com](https://docs.rapiwa.com/)

### **Get All Cancelled Order**
* **Purpose:** Fetches all cancelled orders from the Shopify store.

### **Get Customer Total Spent**
**Purpose:** Filters out customers who have **spent 0** (keeps only those who made purchases).

### 5. **Get Specific Customer Data**
* **Purpose:** Fetches all orders for a **specific customer** using their `customer_id`.


### 6. **Get Product Name with Re-order Link**
* **Purpose:** classify orders for each customer and extracts useful details.

user.name: Rapiwa
user.bio:
Simple, Reliable, Cost-Effective WhatsApp API
Rapiwa is a fast, reliable WhatsApp Business API Solution built for developers. Manage multiple sessions, scale your messaging, and enjoy transparent pricing with no per-message fees.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
